text: PTX is the second studio album by American a cappella band Pentatonix. Released on 19 September 2014 via RCA Records, the work contains songs from PTX Volumes 1 & 2, cover songs from YouTube and seven new Pentatonix songs. == Track listing == == Chart positions == {| class="wikitable" ! Chart (2014) ! title: PTX (album)
